message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.RO

This paper is primarily focused on computer vision, specifically improving the performance of convolutional neural networks in low light and noisy environments. Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also proposes the use of recurrent connections within convolutional layers, which is a technique commonly used in deep learning and falls under the sub-categories of cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). The paper also discusses the use of Bayes-optimal temporal integration, which falls under the sub-category of cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing). Finally, the paper mentions the application of these techniques to real-time video streams of autonomous driving, which falls under the sub-category of cs.RO (Robotics).
